title: Senior Fullstack Java Developer (Momentum Investments - Ref MomInv005)
description: Enviro365 I.T Solutions is looking for a talented and experienced Fullstack Developer to join our dynamic team. As a Fullstack Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining both front-end and back-end systems. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in web development, strong technical skills, excellent problem-solving skills, and a passion for creating innovative solutions.
responsibilities: Working closely with agile teams (developers, product owners, business analysts, etc.) to find solutions and solve business problems using software
